attributes.action: Ghana Passport Fee in the UK for 32-paged booklets should stay £100. #No£180.
attributes.additional_details: Online state that, Ghana Passport is £100 for 32-paged booklet but when you go on the Ghana High Commission page to apply for the passport it says £180 for 32-paged booklet. Why should we pay that for a Passport.
attributes.background: The government or parliament should help the public, Ghanaians most especially not to pay £180 for Ghana Passport. Few months ago it was £100 why the sudden change in fees.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about this are a matter for the Ghanaian Government, not the UK Government or Parliament.
